snippet.title: Harpy's Curse Gameplay
snippet.description:
A few minutes of gameplay showing a good starting route for the Harpy's Curse, for the Atari 7800.

Described as "Joust Meets Metroid," Harpy's Curse offers over 1000 screens to explore, filled with monsters, treasures, power ups and secrets.  

Harpy's Curse is available digitally for the Atari VCS and as a physical cartridge for the Atari 7800 at AtariAge:
https://atariage.com/store/index.php?l=product_detail&p=1311
